mapper.select: SELECT r.recipe_id, r.variation_id, r.submission_date, r.name, r.intro, r.status, s.step_order, i.ingredient_order, i.quantity AS ingredient_quantity, CONVERT (s.description USING utf8) AS step_content, i.name AS ingredient_name, i.uom AS ingredient_uom FROM chefshug.recipes r LEFT OUTER JOIN chefshug.steps s ON r.recipe_id = s.recipe_id AND r.variation_id = s.variation_id LEFT OUTER JOIN chefshug.ingredients i ON r.recipe_id = i.recipe_id AND r.variation_id = i.variation_id ORDER BY r.recipe_id, s.step_order

SELECT r.recipe_id, r.variation_id, r.submission_date, r.name, r.intro, r.status, s.step_order, i.ingredient_order, i.quantity AS ingredient_quantity, CONVERT (s.description USING utf8) AS step_content, i.name AS ingredient_name, i.uom AS ingredient_uom FROM chefshug.recipes r LEFT OUTER JOIN chefshug.steps s ON r.recipe_id = s.recipe_id AND r.variation_id = s.variation_id LEFT OUTER JOIN chefshug.ingredients i ON r.recipe_id = i.recipe_id AND r.variation_id = i.variation_id WHERE r.recipe_id = #{id} ORDER BY s.step_order
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipes (variation_id, submission_date, name, intro, status) VALUES (#{recipe.variation}, CURRENT_DATE(), #{recipe.name}, #{recipe.intro}, #{recipe.status})

INSERT INTO ingredients (recipe_id, variation_id, ingredient_order, name, quantity, uom) VALUES (#{recipe.id}, #{recipe.variation}, #{ingredient.order}, #{ingredient.name}, #{ingredient.quantity}, #{ingredient.uom})
INSERT INTO steps (recipe_id, variation_id, step_order, description) VALUES (#{recipe.id}, #{recipe.variation}, #{step.order}, #{step.content})
